headline: MGM Resorts International Stock Rises on Strong Q1 BetMGM Results
summary: MGM Resorts International said BetMGM's Online Sports and iGaming revenue soared in the first quarter.

raw.headline: MGM Resorts International Stock Rises on Strong Q1 BetMGM Results
raw.summary: MGM Resorts International said BetMGM's Online Sports and iGaming revenue soared in the first quarter.

headline: BetMGM swings to first-quarter profit in e-betting surge
summary: Shares of Entain, which owns the Ladbrokes and Coral brands,  rose as much as 10.1% to 647.6 pence.  BetMGM has been pushing to grow its online presence and capitalise on the booming e-betting market amid stiff competition.
